headline: May Mobility Launches Ride-Hail API, Signaling Readiness to Scale Autonomous Deployments Globally
summary: May Mobility, a leading autonomous vehicle (AV) technology company, today announced the launch of the Ride-Hail Integration API. This development expands the company's Autonomy-as-a-Service (AaaS) offering, readying it for scale in urban markets on ride-hail platforms globally.

headline: Uber stock vs Lyft stock: Good Buy or Goodbye picks revisited
summary: In October 2024, BD8 Capital Partners, LLC CEO and chief investment officer Barbara Doran picked Uber (UBER) over Lyft (LYFT) as part of the Yahoo Finance segment Good Buy or Goodbye. Nearly nine months later, that trade has turned out to be a good call. Both stocks have outperformed the broader market, but Doran still thinks Uber is the company that has the better outlook. Hear more of her take in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
